QuestData.Title: An Unending Sleep
QuestData.Description:
<The direhorn hatchling continues to sleep soundly, despite any efforts on your part to wake it.
It's probably been too long. You should speak to Beastlord L'kala.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Beastlord L'kala in Warbeast Kraal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Beastlord L'kala in Warbeast Kraal.
